name: Morserunner
description:
Learn morse code in a fun way. A runner game where not only reactions matter.

Morserunner is a jump and run game where you learn morse code along the way. All jumps correspond to real morse code. The better you remember the characters, the easier it gets in later levels. And the later levels are quite challenging anyway!

Including cheatcodes and a leveleditor.

Code available at https://github.com/TobiasWust/Morserunner

The first game I built years ago in Phaser. Made available in Google playstore with Cordova.
